Text:
function ERI_EP04_03()
    --.起-1【11月第2週】「姫皇さまがやって来る！ひゅあ！ひゅあ！ひゅあ！」
    SaveData.Title = "姫皇さまがやって来る！ひゅあ！ひゅあ！ひゅあ！"

    --//BG：メインストリート（冬・昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ November, when the wind has become cold. As I passed through the gates of Yuriai Private Academy, I happened to run into Lira and Hiyu. ]])

    --//CG：登校シーン（リラ・ヒユ・エリカ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc007ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0967.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, everyone. It's especially cold today, isn't it?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0440.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "GGY! Man, this outfit is seriously cold too. Maybe I should think about a winter uniform coordinate~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "This is why exhibitionists like Lira are no good. True beauties’ fashion requires modesty, right, Sister Erika?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0441.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "A girl’s gotta endure some exposure for the sake of fashion, that’s what I say. You think so too, Erika, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0968.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Both arguments have merit, and I think they're wonderful perspectives." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "There you go again, agreeing with everything. Seriously, you can put Hiyu in her place if you want." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "The one who needs putting in her place is you, Lira! A classic beauty like Sister Erika doesn’t need to show skin!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hmm. Then what’s that folder on your phone called ‘Big Sister’s Bare Legs’?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuah!? H-How do you know about that!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0444.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Oh, it’s really there. That’s just creepy—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Heeeyyyyy! Y-You tricked me, you fiend!" ]])

    --//CG：登校シーン（リラ・ヒユ・エリカ・ウラン）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc007ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh my, it’s lively this morning. Good day to everyone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0969.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, Uran-san, Ryuguuin-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Good day, Sister Erika. Thank you for accompanying me to the hamburger place yesterday on the way home." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0970.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I wanted to eat there for a while too, so don’t mention it. Let’s go again together sometime." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I-I want to come next time too! I’ll skip club if I have to!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Let’s invite the other ‘Knights’ too, have a study session while snacking on fries—it sounds fun, right?<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I would very much like to join as well. Hamburgers are one Western dish I’d love to try at least once." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0446.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Wait, wait—that means hamburger... huh, is that right!? Uran-senpai said a foreign word without messing it up!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hehe. I’m making an effort to overcome my weak English." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Thanks to the speed riding duels I recently started, my English is improving rapidly.<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0447.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hard to believe, but you probably meant 'learning,' right? Where’d you learn about riding duels anyway? Do you duel?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing the usual back-and-forth naturally made me smile. ]])

    MSG([[ These peaceful days have continued without incident for the past month. I’ve completely gotten along with the conservatives, and there’s been no quarrels or disputes. ]])

    MSG([[ However, the investigation regarding Marika-neesan has made no progress. Through Uran-san, I gathered information from the second years and some third years, but no useful leads were found. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected, the person most likely to have clues about Marika-neesan now is only Daria-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0971.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "By the way, has anyone heard anything about Daria-san recently?" ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone shook their heads in unison. I’ve lost count of how many times this exchange has happened. ]])

    MSG([[ Worrying about Daria-san isn’t just me; everyone is gathering information independently. Still, her whereabouts remain unknown. ]])

    MSG([[ The school has no report either, so we’re completely at a dead end. ]])

    MSG([[ But then, unexpected information came to us. ]])

    --//BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ione Heiwado】
 "Oh my, good day to all of you~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Jasuko Heiwado】
 "The Erika group gathered early this morning—speak of the devil, here you are." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0972.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, Ione-san, Jasuko-san. What do you mean by ‘speak of the devil’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The Heiwado sisters blinked in surprise and told us astonishing news. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ione Heiwado】
 "Sister Erika, you haven’t heard? Actually, there’s been an interesting rumor circulating at school since this morning." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Jasuko Heiwado】
 "Apparently, from tomorrow until graduation, Hermes-san will be coming to school every day." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0973.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes-san? Why on earth?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ In the absence of Daria-san, this sudden big news. ]])

    MSG([[ Could it be related to Daria-san’s disappearance? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ione Heiwado】
 "We haven’t gotten all the details yet either. When new info comes in, we’ll let you know, Sis." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Jasuko Heiwado】
 "Since this is the best business opportunity since enrollment, we can’t miss this big wave." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0974.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you both. I hope it leads to a business opportunity." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ウラン（通常）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "How is it that even we ‘Princesses’ haven’t been informed?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0448.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Maybe it was decided suddenly? Hermes-senpai tends to act on a whim." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0975.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Either way, it’s a chance to hear from Daria-san. When I meet her tomorrow, I’ll ask for details." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0976.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "For now, let’s prepare to ensure no problems happen when Hermes-san comes to the school." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hehe. At the recent Hakuyou Festival, many were overwhelmed by Hermes-sama’s cuteness and nearly became rioters." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Don’t talk about it like it was a good memory... it was really tough." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Seriously, needing panic countermeasures just because she shows up is monstrous." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0977.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But I think you two are pretty amazing yourselves." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Lira-san, the princess gal who can make others obey her orders by force. Uran-san, the princess shrine maiden who moves people to tears. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet the beauty who surpasses these extraordinary two is Hermes Himegami, called the ‘<r=ひめおう>Princess Empress</r>.’ ]])

    MSG([[ The ‘Princess Empress’—also known as ‘Princess Royal’—is the title given to the top beauty of this academy, both in name and fact. ]])

    MSG([[ Each year at the end of March, a special ‘Princess Election’ is held where anyone can run if recommended by other ‘Princesses’— ]])

    MSG([[ the crown is given to the one who receives the most votes in the ‘<r=ひめおうせんきょ>Princess Empress Election</r>.’ ]])

    --//BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：ウラン（通常）、リラ（通常）、ヒユ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Speaking of Hermes-sama! Erika-onee-sama, aren’t you participating in the Princess Empress Election!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0978.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "M-me? Why would that be?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Your popularity is at its peak now! With this momentum, you could take the top spot!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah, I thought that too. Honestly, Erika, isn’t the flow totally in your favor right now?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "If you become Princess Empress as a first-year, it’s exactly a resurgence of the Marika Ikusa legend, so aim for it aggressively." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0979.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "What do you mean by ‘resurgence of Marika’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Huh? You don’t know? It’s a famous story." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Maybe it just never came up because it’s common knowledge at Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

    MSG([[ Confused by the story I heard for the first time, Lira-san and Uran-san kindly explained the details to me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "First of all, it’s understood that the higher your year, the more popular a ‘Princess’ tends to be, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0980.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes. Because they are role models, it’s natural to aspire to be a ‘Knight’ of the upper-year Princesses." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. Many have a long period of activity as ‘Princesses,’ so popularity naturally follows year seniority." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0299.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "According to my research, about 60% of all ‘Knights’ at Yuriai Private Academy now follow either third-year Daria-san or Hermes-san!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0455.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Whoa, wow. So Hermes-senpai has 40%, Daria-paisen 20%, and Uran-senpai and Erika split the remaining 40%, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0300.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "No, since the Himegami sisters are treated as a group, it’s safe to say both together have the majority support of the academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Especially Daria-san is a ‘Princess’ and also a ‘Knight’ of Hermes-sama. She’s on a different level from us junior Princesses." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0981.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If our ‘Knights’ make up 20%, that’s roughly three times as many." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Putting it in numbers reveals an enormous gap. We had struggled immensely just to gain 20%, and yet that’s three times as many. ]])

    MSG([[ The ‘Princess Empress Election’ feels like a distant dream. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    --//BG：3F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Back to the main point, the one who broke the ‘popularity follows seniority’ rule as a first-year was your cousin, Marika Ikusa." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0301.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "There has apparently been only one person in the long history of Yuriai Private Academy who became ‘Princess Empress’ as a first-year!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0457.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Back then, it was the Princess Empress Election between the unbeatable number one ‘<r=きらゆきひめ>Kira Yukihime</r>’ and ‘<r=うれいひめ>Yuki</r>.’ Man, that was intense." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0458.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hiyu and I watched the election from the junior high seating, and the cheers shook the venue so much we thought it was an earthquake." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0302.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "M-Marika-sama’s face was so beautiful even from afar I almost melted~~~ Just remembering it makes my nose bleed..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Her name echoed even through junior high. Truly, a living legend." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0982.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I had no idea that happened." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As expected of Marika-neesan. Not only did she become a ‘Princess,’ but she also left such achievements. ]])

    MSG([[ No wonder people were surprised when I once claimed to be Marika-neesan’s brother. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0983.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hearing this makes me feel that I really lack the strength." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That’s natural. The title of ‘Princess Empress’ is originally given to a graduating third-year ‘Princess’ to fill the void left by the senior Princess." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "For the year until the next ‘Princess Empress’ is chosen, she serves to convey the graduate’s achievements." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "When graduate legends are talked about, it inspires us to work harder." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0984.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Then I think it’s best if Hermes-san wins the next Princess Empress Election. Someone like me—no way." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As I said that, I suddenly realized. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan became ‘Princess Empress’ in her first year. And this March, the one chosen as ‘Princess Empress’ was Hermes-san. ]])

    MSG([[ In other words, the person who took the title from Marika-neesan just before she collapsed was— ]])

    --//SE：チャイムの音
PLAY_SE("SEb016.wav")
WAIT(600)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0460.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Yikes! We talked too long! Let’s hurry to class!" ]])

    MSG([[ Grasped by Lira-san, we hurried up the stairs. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0985.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, let’s talk again after school!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. I’ll be waiting in the Japanese-style room as usual." ]])

STOP_SE("SEb016")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ And so, unexpectedly, we moved closer to the truth. ]])

    MSG([[ Right before Marika-neesan collapsed this March, she was defeated in the Princess Empress Election and lost the title. ]])

    MSG([[ The one who defeated her was none other than Hermes Himegami, who will start attending Yuriai Private Academy from tomorrow. Including the disappearance of Daria-san, it can’t be mere coincidence. ]])

    MSG([[ Though I’d often been bewildered by her carefree personality when we met before, it can’t go on like that. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ve decided I will get clues out of Hermes-san by any means necessary. ]])
    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_04")
end
